alert.note: Alert for Inland Onslow; Jones; Northern Craven; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Jones, south central Lenoir, southwestern Craven, northern Onslow and southeastern Duplin Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 357 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Deep Run to near Chinquapin to Willard. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Wallace, Half Moon, Phillips Crossroads, Richlands, Beulaville, Maysville, Catherine Lake, Kellum, Cypress Creek, Comfort, Chinquapin, Belgrade, Potters Hill, Petersburg, Pleasant Hill, Albert J Ellis Airport, Richlands South, Deppe and Lyman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Inland Onslow; Jones; Northern Craven; Southern Craven
